entry.title: Leak: See the new Samsung Galaxy S8 & S8+ color options (Orchid Grey, yes please!)
entry.content:
We're less than a week away from the official announcement of the Samsung's newest Galaxy flagship, the Galaxy S8 and it's larger counterpart, the Galaxy S8+ but that doesn't stop us from oohing and aahing over the latest leaks.

We now know some of the color options for both device variants thanks to popular leakster, Evan Blass, who gives us a good look at what we can expect on March 29.

...and finally: Samsung Galaxy S8 and S8 Plus (left to right) in Black Sky, Orchid Grey, and Arctic Silver (top to bottom). pic.twitter.com/pIUJskyFbK

— Evan Blass (@evleaks) March 21, 2017

 

Black sky, orchid grey, arctic silver, and a later leaked gold variant will most likely be available but we'll only know for sure which variants will be available in which countries on March 29 during Samsung's Unpacked event. The official unveiling will take place in NYC at 11am EST at the Lincoln Center in NYC. If you can't make it in person, check out the live stream link below. We'll see you there!

Link: Live stream the Samsung Unpacked event on March 29 here

For full leaked specifications and more information on the Samsung Galaxy S8 & S8+ check out one of our favorite tech news sites, Digital Trends.

Link: Digital Trends: Samsung Galaxy S8 Rumors and News Leaks

entry.title: VRS Design Unveils The Samsung Galaxy S8 And S8 Plus Case Collection
entry.content:
LA MIRADA, Calif., March 13, 2017 /PRNewswire/ -- VRS Design®, a leader in design of fashion-forward premium smartphone cases and accessories, unveiled today the latest case collection for the Samsung Galaxy S®8 and S®8 Plus.

Designed from a fashion standpoint, worn as an accessory and made for the contemporary individual, the new twelve model case collection features four stylish, functional and all-around protection cases: Crystal Bumper, Simpli Mod, Damda Folder and Layered Dandy. 

All four cases are crafted with individuality, purpose, quality and style featuring impact-resistant, thermoplastic polyurethane materials and a lightweight polycarbonate layer that provides protection without compromising style. Offered in a range of colors, the Galaxy S8 and S8 Plus collection allows for the Samsung Galaxy to be an innovative lifestyle statement. Highly designed for accessibility and functionality, VRS Design has created the ultimate frame to protect and style your Samsung Galaxy S8 and S8 Plus.

"As much as we don't want to cover up the sleek finish of our new Samsung Galaxy S8 or S8 Plus, protecting them is a must," says Tony Chung, CEO of VRS Design. "But we want to at least look good doing it. And since our phones go everywhere we do, it doesn't hurt if the case has some extra utility, too."

Introducing the VRS Design Galaxy S8 & Galaxy S8 Plus Case Collection

  • Crystal Bumper - Showcases your device with complementary colored bumpers and a clear body. Show off the beautiful design of your device while protecting it from daily drops. Features: streamlined design creates a slim and bulk-free build; color-matched polycarbonate bumpers and clear TPU enhance the original look of your device; edges of the TPU are designed to protrude and protect exposed areas of your device. Available in dark silver, satin silver, shine gold & rose gold. $29.99 MSRP (US)
  • Simpli Mod - Artfully combines two premium materials into one lightweight package. The slim, cover creates a stylish statement to complement your everyday look. Features: super slim design offers a bulk-free cover; lightweight yet sturdy polycarbonate provides protection without compromising style; spacious cut-outs allow perfect access to device ports and controls at all times. Available in black & brown. $24.99 MSRP (US)
  • Damda Folder - Perfect companion for travelers and card collectors alike. Comfortably carry up to 4 credit cards and ID and still be able to slip your phone into your back pocket. Features: carry up to 4 cards with you at all times; card compartment stays unnoticeable and secures your cards while you're on the move; dual-layer construction of polycarbonate and TPU create a dependable daily defense. Available in dark silver, satin silver, shine gold, rose gold. $39.99 MSRP (US)
  • Layered Dandy - Brings understated sophistication to the palm of your hand. Use the carefully crafted slots and sleeves to carry your cards and cash with you daily. Features: easily secure your contents and shield your screen; carry up to 3 cards and cash with you at all times; cut-outs allow access to speaker and mic even when the cover is closed. Available in black, wine red & coffee brown. $34.99 MSRP (US)

The entire VRS Design Galaxy S8 & S8 Plus Case Collection is now available for pre-orders at vrsdesign.com.

About VRS Design
Founded in 2004, VRS Design has established itself as a brand leader in South Korea. Entering the North American market in 2014, VRS Design now ships to over 50 countries to provide customers with international accessibility to VRS Design products.

VRS Design emphasizes style and functionality in premium pocket-friendly packages that seamlessly adapt to a day in the life of the modern tech user. With beginnings in South Korea, VRS Design is rapidly increasing its influence worldwide by realizing the needs of today's smartphone users through continuous creative effort.

For additional information, visit vrsdesign.com.

BREA, California – February 19, 2016 – VRS Design™—formerly known as Verus®—is announcing the all-new Damda Clip, a wallet-replacement, money clip case for the Samsung Galaxy S®7 and Galaxy S®7 Edge.

The newest iteration of the iconic Damda wallet series, the Damda Clip is an in-category world-first as a money clip/cell phone case hybrid engineered for extra card security, style, and protection. Made of thermoplastic polyurethane and polycarbonate, the Damda Clip is sturdy and resistant to impact, making it ideal for individuals on-the-go. A sideways money clip on top of a recessed pocket improves upon the traditional money clip design with a superior clamping mechanism that supports up to three, traditional-sized credit cards.

The Damda Clip is designed to be the perfect complement for consumers transitioning into using momentum-gaining mobile payment services such as Android Pay™ and Samsung Pay  to all-but-eliminate their wallets and consolidate their essentials into a single, simple solution to their daily needs. NFC and Qi wireless charging compatibility is maintained while loaded.

Pricing & Availability

  • The Damda Clip—priced at $32.99 MSRP (US)— will be available for the Galaxy S7 and Galaxy S7 Edge in Dark Silver, Satin Silver, Shine Gold, Rose Gold, and White at launch.
  • Beginning mid-March, the Damda Clip will be sold through vrsdesign.com and select authorized resellers.
  • Pricing and color availability are subject to change.

About VRS Design

Originally named after the Latin word for “true,” VRS Design was founded in South Korea as Verus, a manufacturer of third-party Apple® accessories. The company first opened its North American branch in Brea, California in 2014 as its global operations headquarters and has since entered Canadian online and retail distribution channels. VRS Design products are available in over 40 countries worldwide, and annual revenue currently exceeds 50 million USD.

Flagship products include the popular Damda series, a cell phone case and wallet hybrid; the Layered Dandy, a PU leather wallet case; and the High Pro Shield, a minimalistic, brushed metal design case.

For additional information, visit vrsdesign.com.

entry.title: Verus Rebrands as VRS Design
entry.content:
BREA, California—February 17, 2016—Verus®—known for its mid-to-high-end Apple® and Android™ cell phone cases and covers—is announcing a complete, company rebranding initiative in the 2016 fiscal year to accompany its expanding product line-up and changing corporate philosophy. The Verus brand and all of its properties—with the exception of older product lines nearing discontinuation—will adopt the VRS Design™ name and insignia effective immediately. Products in stock already branded as Verus will continue to be sold until depletion.

The decision revolves around design and fashion as focal points of all upcoming product launches in response to the current climate of rapidly changing consumer demand in the mobile accessories market especially. Other efforts have been made to further dominate the target demographic of professionals in their 20s and 30s: to create deeper immersion into the brand’s new design language, VRS Design is also diversifying its product portfolio beyond cell phone and tablet cases to include a wider range of offerings.
